name: Godstrick DEMO
description:
DEMO - COMING SOON LORE

 Your dad has been missing for 10 years now. Nobody knows what happened to him, but you remember that a couple minutes before he vanished, he screamed: '' Im Going to Heaven!''. 

  After years investigating this case, you found one answer, a phone, it was the phone that made your dad disappear. After a couple days  the black phone appears in your room, with one question:

Do you wanna go to Heaven?

    YES                          NO        

You click yes. 

If you find God he will free you from this hellish place 

Welcome to Heaven

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

GAMEPLAY

You have a grappling hook, good luck.

Treat the grappling gun as a spider-man web.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
